greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Lemniscate constant.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Lemniscate Constant
program: (PARI) { allocatemem(932245000); default(realprecision, 5080); x=gamma(1/4)^2/sqrt(2*Pi); for (n=1, 5000, d=floor(x); x=(x-d)*10; write("b064853.txt", n, " ", d)); } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Jun 20 2009
(MAGMA) SetDefaultRealField(RealField(100)); R:= RealField(); Gamma(1/4)^2/Sqrt(2*Pi(R)); // _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 07 2018
results.author: _Eric W. Weisstein_, Sep 22 2001
